typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Marques as string,
		{Région} as string,
		{Nom Agence} as string,
		CIA as string,
		{Département} as string,
		{Référence Article} as string,
		{Description Article} as string,
		{Catégorie Achat} as string,
		{Quantitées livrées} as string,
		str_mois as string,
		year as string,
		{Gestion entrepôt} as string,
		{Marques/ Constructeur} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		{Nom Coopérative} as string,
		{CP Coop.} as string,
		POSSAMid as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		BrandID as string,
		Dept as string,
		{Code Postal} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> OrganisationEHS
source(output(
		yearmonth as string,
		Article as string,
		{Code client} as string,
		{Qt� vente directe} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> VenteDirecte
source1 derive(month = iif(str_mois=="janvier", "01",     
 iif(str_mois=="février","02",    
  iif(str_mois=="mars", "03",      
  iif(str_mois=="avril", "04",      
  iif(str_mois=="mai", "05",      
  iif(str_mois=="juin", "06",      
  iif(str_mois=="juillet", "07",      
  iif(str_mois=="Août", "08",      
  iif(str_mois=="Septembre", "09",      
  iif(str_mois=="Octobre", "10",      
  iif(str_mois=="Novembre", "11",      
  iif(str_mois=="Décembre", "12", "0"))))))))))))) ~> ConvertMonth
ConvertMonth derive(yearmonth = year+month) ~> ExtractMonthYear
ExtractMonthYear filter(!isNull(CIA)) ~> FiltrerCIA
OrganisationEHS filter(!isNull({CP Coop.})) ~> FiltreCPCoop
FiltreCPCoop aggregate(groupBy({CP Coop.},
		HubSAPid),
	{Nom Coopérative} = max({Nom Coopérative}),
		POSSAMid = max(POSSAMid),
		BrandID = max(BrandID),
		Dept = max(Dept),
		{Code Postal} = max({Code Postal})) ~> UniqueCpCoopHubsApid
FiltrerCIA, UniqueCpCoopHubsApid join(CIA == {CP Coop.},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> InnerJoinCIACPCoop
FiltrerCIA, UniqueCpCoopHubsApid join(CIA == {CP Coop.},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinLeftCIACPCoop
InnerJoinCIACPCoop, Rename join({Référence Article} == Article
	&& ExtractMonthYear@yearmonth == Rename@yearmonth
	&& POSSAMid == {Code client},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinVenteDirect
JoinVenteDirect derive({Quantitées livrées} = toDouble({Quantitées livrées}) - coalesce(toDouble({Qté vente directe}) , 0)) ~> QuantiteesLivres
VenteDirecte select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		Article,
		{Code client},
		{Qté vente directe} = {Qt� vente directe}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Rename
QuantiteesLivres derive(reference = replace({Référence Article}, 'SDU', '')) ~> Reference
Reference derive(distributeur = "EHS") ~> distributeur
distributeur select(mapColumn(
		marque_str = Marques,
		{Région},
		{Nom Agence},
		agence_code = CIA,
		{Département},
		{Référence Article},
		{Description Article},
		{Catégorie Achat},
		qte_ecoulement = {Quantitées livrées},
		str_mois,
		year,
		{Gestion entrepôt},
		{Marques/ Constructeur},
		month,
		yearmonth = ExtractMonthYear@yearmonth,
		{CP Coop.},
		HubSAPid,
		{Nom Coopérative},
		POSSAMidString = POSSAMid,
		BrandID,
		Dept,
		{Code postal} = {Code Postal},
		yearmonth = Rename@yearmonth,
		Article,
		{Code client},
		{Qté vente directe},
		reference,
		distributeur
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RenamePOSSAMIDstring
RenamePOSSAMIDstring select(mapColumn(
		marque_file = marque_str,
		{Région},
		{Nom Agence},
		agence_code,
		{Département},
		{Référence Article},
		{Description Article},
		{Catégorie Achat},
		qte_ecoulement,
		str_mois,
		year,
		{Gestion entrepôt},
		{Marques/ Constructeur},
		month,
		yearmonth,
		{CP Coop.},
		HubSAPid,
		{Nom Coopérative},
		POSSAMidString,
		BrandID,
		Dept,
		{Code postal},
		Article,
		{Code client},
		{Qté vente directe},
		reference,
		distributeur
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RenameMarqueFile
RenameMarqueFile sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		yearmonth as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		ca_ecoulement as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		reference as string,
		distributeur as string,
		agence_code as string,
		marque as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		marque_name as string,
		toreplicate as string,
		dd as string,
		rcount as string,
		indexcols2 as string,
		qte_ecc as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['SortieEcoulementEHS.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SoriteEHS
JoinLeftCIACPCoop sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		yearmonth as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		ca_ecoulement as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		reference as string,
		distributeur as string,
		agence_code as string,
		marque as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		marque_name as string,
		toreplicate as string,
		dd as string,
		rcount as string,
		indexcols2 as string,
		qte_ecc as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['EHSOrganisationNotfound.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> EHSOrganisationNotfound
